conclusion: Analyze the image to understand the flow of liquid through the baffles.
The image shows different colored lines labeled A, B, C, D, E, and F, representing paths of liquid flow.
Arrows indicate the direction of flow from A, B, C, and D to E and F.
From A, the liquid flows to E.
From B, the liquid flows to F.
From C, the liquid flows to F.
From D, the liquid flows to E.
From E, the liquid flows to D.
From F, the liquid flows to D.
Analyze the flow paths from E and F to determine the final destination.
The liquid will flow into the container labeled D after passing through the baffles.
